project_descr: Strengthen institutions, enterprises and communities to improve their productive and income generation capacities by supporting the development of inclusive green value chains in tourism, mining, and agriculture sectors.

outputs.output_descr: The Programme aims to strengthen institutions, enterprises and communities to improve their productive and income generation capacities by supporting the development of inclusive green value chains in tourism, mining, and agriculture sectors.

document_name: Inclusive Green Growth for Poverty Reduction Programme
